content:
I am trying to define some notation to quantify algorithmic runtime in Lean. I want to define some notation like O(...) ∈ O(...) where the ellipses in the parentheses match exactly. I was wondering if this would be notionally possible in Lean?

Maybe something like

notation : "O(" f( ...)  ") ∈ O(" g(...) ")"

I am not particularly sure of what to put in the dots though.
Lev Stambler has marked this topic as resolved.
